t: Akmak - Karabetian Import & Distribution, Inc.
s: August 1, 2023 - In 1893, the Soojian family established the first Armenian bakery in the United States in Lowell, Massachusetts, serving baked foods from the Middle East to Armenian immigrants. In 1936, they resettled in California and renamed the company Ak-Mak Bakeries.

t: Mystery of the disappearing Armenian cracker company. What happened to Sanger’s Ak-mak?
s: March 25, 2025 - Ak-mak Bakeries has closed its family run business. Its popular healthy, whole wheat crackers no longer on grocery store shelves nationwide.
